general_description: Raw (unprocessed) Amazon product data collected through web scraping. This dataset contains electronics product information including prices, ratings, delivery information, and sales metadata.

data_quality.observations: Raw dataset containing missing values, format inconsistencies, and data requiring cleaning and transformation
data_quality.required_treatment: Price cleaning, rating normalization, null value handling, date standardization

schema.notes: Always populated field, may contain special characters and quotes

schema.description: Average product rating in 'X.X out of 5 stars' format
schema.notes: Text format that needs to be converted to numeric
Text format with commas as thousands separators (e.g., '2,457')

schema.description: Number of units purchased in the last month
schema.notes: Text format like '300+ bought in past month', '6K+ bought in past month'
May be empty, numeric format when present
Format 'basic variant price: $XX.XX' or 'nan' when not applicable
Format '$XXX.XX' or 'No Discount' when no discount available

schema.description: Indicates if product has 'Best Seller' badge
Indicates if product is sponsored or organic

schema.notes: Format 'Save XX% with coupon' or 'No Coupon'

schema.description: Availability of Buy Box button on search page
schema.notes: Values: 'Add to cart' when available, empty field when not available
Format 'Delivery Day, Month Date' or empty field

schema.description: Tags related to sustainability and environmental impact
schema.notes: Frequently empty field, when present contains text like 'Carbon impact'

schema.description: Direct URL to product image on Amazon
URL to official product page on Amazon
schema.notes: Relative URLs that need to be concatenated with Amazon domain

schema.description: Date and time when data was collected
